documentation.text:
@title MultiTokenStaking
 @dev 允许用户质押基础代币和其他代币，根据年化利率产出指定代币，并在满足条件时奖励NFT。

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Stake amount must be greater than minimum stake amount"

arguments.value: Stake amount must be greater than minimum stake amount

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Stake amount must be greater than minimum stake amount"

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (struct MultiTokenStaking.StakeInfo storage pointer) view returns (uint8)

documentation.text:
@dev 质押基础代币和其他代币
 @param _baseAmount 基础代币数量，单位为wei

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Unstake amount must be greater than 0"

arguments.value: Unstake amount must be greater than 0

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Unstake amount must be greater than 0"

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (struct MultiTokenStaking.StakeInfo storage pointer) view returns (uint8)

documentation.text:
@dev 解除质押，返还基础代币和其他代币
 @param _amount 要解除质押的基础代币数量

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (struct MultiTokenStaking.StakeInfo storage pointer) view returns (uint8)

documentation.text:
@dev 获取质押信息
 @param _user 用户地址
@dev 获取所有代币的地址和比例，以及年化利率，最小质押数量，最短质押时长

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Withdraw amount must be greater than 0"

arguments.value: Withdraw amount must be greater than 0

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Withdraw amount must be greater than 0"

documentation.text:
@dev 提现奖励代币，仅限合约所有者使用
 @param _amount 提现数量
